content: {A害羞冒烟}Th-Then, could you please, craft me a window...? <style=SizeSmall>Eeep—it's so embarrassing!</style>
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A想象}I wanted to add a window to let more breeze and sunlight into the house to help the seeds grow better...
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A害羞冒烟}Sorry! I came here to settle down, but I can't even sort my life out. <style=SizeSmall>I really need to become more independent...</style>
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A云果双手举高}Yeeek! Y-You scared me... Oh, it's just you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. I didn't see you just now.
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: Y'all make crafting furniture look so easy, but when I look at all those complicated designs on the Inspo Card... My eyes get it, but my hands sure don't.
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: I'd also like a potted plant to test the soil with. In your <style=Highlight>Inspo Card Binder</style>, anything that's a <style=Highlight>potted plant you can put down on the ground</style> would be fine.
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: I'll help you craft some furniture!
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: ...W-Well, um, I have to say I'm really not that great at crafting furniture.
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: ...But I ended up makin' it all crooked and wonky, and it felt like the house would fall apart if I installed it. <style=SizeSmall>Why can't furniture just grow from the ground mah...</style>
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: Well mah... {A心虚目移}c-could I ask for just one last thing? Some lickle seeds need high temperatures to "break through" for germination.
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3
云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: If you could also get a <style=Highlight>Lotusgleam Mini Heater</style> from <style=NpcName>Glenn</style>, {A笑眯眯}that would be wonderful~! Three pieces of furniture are more than enough! Thank you so much for this.
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: This is the <style=Highlight>Inspo Card: Harvestsong Window</style> that I drew up. The dream home for me and the seeds will need more breeze and sunshine.
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: Y-You scared me... oh! {A害羞冒烟}So you found out. I haven't had time to fix the furniture...
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: R-Really mah?! It feels like I'm makin' a nuisance of myself again, but at the same time, it's a huge relief to me...
info: 云果家装-云果_主流程文本3

content: Yeee~? You don't seem to have any gatherin' tools. I just bought a new <style=Highlight>mattock</style>. Here, you can use it to gather wood and ore.

If you could also get a <style=Highlight>Lotusgleam Mini Heater</style> from <style=NpcName>Glenn</style>, {A笑眯眯}that would be wonderful~! Three pieces of furniture are more than enough! Thank you so much for this.
